channel.title: When i die the whole server disconnects
channel.description:
when my friend or i kill my friend i get this error
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.ApplyDead(client.java:25012) at client.ApplyDead(client.java:24975) at client.process(client.java:17417) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:49)[/code]
idk what this is i need help thanks

item.title: When i die the whole server disconnects

ApplyDead(client.java:line 25012)
